name: ping-pong-prompt-app
description: A Next.js application for prompt refinement with ping-pong interactions

scripts.orbt:status: node -e "console.log('ORBT Status:'); const orbt = require('./utils/orbt_doctrine.js'); console.log('Operating System:', orbt.tiers[30000].label); console.log('Repair System:', orbt.tiers[20000].label); console.log('Build System:', orbt.tiers[10000].label); console.log('Training System:', orbt.tiers[5000].label);"
